Header: Notices issued on Basil and Risath
Content: The Court of Appeal today (Feb. 02) issued notices to a group including former Minister Basil Rajapaksa, Minister Risath Bathiudeen and his brother Rizwan Bathiudeen. It was relating to two petitions filed against the destruction of Wilpattu forest. Attorney Nagananda Kodithuwakku and another person have filed the petition citing illegal settlement in the Wilaththikulam Reserve, which is belonging to the buffer zone of the Wilpattu Reserve. The respondents were asked to appear in courts on 5th of March. The petitions were taken up before Court of Appeal judges Preethi Padman Surasena and Shiran Gooneratne.
